title: Blood Moon Yasuo
body:
I really like the skin, but a different sound effect for his q could be nice. High Noon Yasuo has one too, and that is also a 975 rp skin.

Just an idea tho.

replies.body:
Hey opticpred8torNL - 

The weapon for High Noon was a gun sword (technical term here), which is why we had a cool opportunity to add a different sound for the (Q). For this one, this weapon is similar to base, which is why we felt it didn't warrant new SFX.

This is similar to why on his emote, the flute audio hasn't changed.
Hey what kind of instruments are on the table for a potential Yasuo skin? All of them? Because I kinda want a Labrosone skin where he wields and plays brass instruments.
We don't really have constraints, as long as it works for the thematic!
Hey, so I'm really excited about Yasuo's new skin. However, where did everyone find out about this?
He's currently on our PBE testing environment. :] Websites like Surrender@20 do coverage of the new content, such as videos and screenshots!
ok, thanks!
No problem! ^-^
I'm not a huge forum goer but it's nice to see how active you Reds be, so i'd like to say thanks
Of course! Always glad to help where I can. :3

Also I'm learning yasuo because of the blood moon skin (it'll be my third, thresh and shen). I just hope I can make this ad character work for me. And do you have any idea of the possibility of a Blood moon Diana, or Leona (red light from an evil moon yes plz)
It's certainly possible!
Warden Yasuo with stylish Ocarina please :3

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=eFfEEAlo,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2016-02-12T18:16:01.451+0000)
>
> Warden Yasuo with stylish Ocarina please :3

DO WANT!!!!
Does it mean that he won't have even a demonic-voice effect?
Correct, he uses base VO.
This a bit diasppointing, I thought he deserved some spooky filter.
The flute audio isn't changing because you decided to stay with a flute rather than give him a new instrument or even just simply change the tune?
We didn't feel it was something that needed to change for this particular skin in order to fit the thematic.

It does seem that the Q needs its own sound effect.
High Noon Q sound makes the skin..Project yas looks epic, but the q is also lacking "oom"..like yi's light saber is really good.
Feels like the blood moon could benefit from a custom Q sound...some swishy blood please.
The skin it self looks good, but I don't wana play with default sound effects...like somthing is missing.

google blood splat sound effect ..this is just one : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fi4SGhB0uko
Some blood "whoosh" would be nice to have.
